job description:
Are you a Data Analyst that has advanced SQL skills? Do you have passion for leveraging data to find deep, meaningful insights? If so, please read on.

This White Plains, NY based technology company seeks a talented Data Analyst that will work with colleagues to provide data analysis, data solutions and data analytics.

As the Data Analyst, you will:
• Work with the marketing team and their data needs including digital and mail campaigns
• Build and run SQL scripts to extract data
• Be responsible data quality and design solutions to complex data issues
• Provide ad-hoc queries and reports
• Improve workflow and procedures related to data systems and analysis
What you need:
  • Bachelors degree and 3+ years in a data analysis or SQL developer role
  • Experience with SQL development and manipulating data
  • Experience with relational databases, MySQL preferred but not required
  • Advanced skills in Data Analysis
